courses.description: Master the basics of Python programming. Learn syntax, data structures, functions, and object-oriented programming. This course is the foundation for all advanced AI and machine learning topics.

modules.title: Python Basics
modules.shortDescription: Variables, data types, and operators in Python.
modules.fullDescription: Start your Python journey with variables, basic data types (integers, floats, strings, booleans), and operators. Understand how Python stores and manipulates data.

modules.title: Control Flow
modules.shortDescription: If statements, loops, and conditional logic.
modules.fullDescription: Master control flow with if-else statements, for loops, while loops, and nested conditions. Learn how to direct program execution based on conditions.

modules.title: Functions and Modules
modules.shortDescription: Define functions, use built-in modules, and organize code.
modules.fullDescription: Write reusable code with functions, understand scope and namespaces, and explore Python's rich standard library. Learn to organize your code into modules.

courses.description: Understand the core concepts of machine learning. Learn supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and how to build predictive models using scikit-learn and real datasets.

modules.title: ML Fundamentals
modules.shortDescription: Core concepts of supervised and unsupervised learning.
modules.fullDescription: Understand what machine learning is, the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning, and the machine learning workflow. Learn about training and testing data.

modules.title: Regression Models
modules.shortDescription: Linear regression, polynomial regression, and evaluation metrics.
modules.fullDescription: Learn how to predict continuous values using regression. Understand linear and polynomial regression, cost functions, and how to evaluate model performance.

modules.title: Classification Models
modules.shortDescription: Logistic regression, decision trees, and ensemble methods.
modules.fullDescription: Build classifiers that predict categories. Explore logistic regression, decision trees, random forests, and gradient boosting for classification tasks.

modules.title: Clustering
modules.fullDescription: Discover patterns in data using unsupervised learning. Master K-means clustering, hierarchical methods, and density-based clustering techniques.

courses.description: Build and train deep neural networks using TensorFlow and Keras. Learn about CNNs, RNNs, and modern architectures for computer vision and natural language processing.

modules.title: Neural Network Basics
modules.fullDescription: Understand how neural networks work from first principles. Learn about neurons, activation functions, layers, and the backpropagation algorithm.

modules.title: Convolutional Neural Networks
modules.shortDescription: CNN architecture for image recognition and computer vision.
modules.fullDescription: Master CNNs for processing images. Learn about convolution, pooling, and modern architectures like ResNet and VGG. Build image classifiers.

modules.title: Recurrent Neural Networks
modules.shortDescription: LSTM, GRU, and sequence modeling for time series data.
modules.fullDescription: Process sequential data with RNNs, LSTMs, and GRUs. Learn to handle time series, text sequences, and build models that understand temporal patterns.

modules.title: Transfer Learning
modules.shortDescription: Leverage pre-trained models for your own tasks.
modules.fullDescription: Use pre-trained models to accelerate your projects. Learn fine-tuning strategies and how to adapt existing architectures for new tasks.

courses.description: Process and analyze human language with NLP techniques. Learn tokenization, embeddings, and transformers. Build chatbots and text classification systems.

modules.title: NLP Fundamentals
modules.fullDescription: Start with the basics of NLP. Learn tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, and how to preprocess text data for machine learning models.

modules.title: Word Embeddings
modules.fullDescription: Understand how to represent words as dense vectors. Learn Word2Vec, GloVe, and FastText embeddings for semantic understanding.

modules.title: Transformer Models
modules.fullDescription: Master modern NLP with transformers. Learn attention mechanisms, fine-tune BERT and GPT models for your applications.
